entry.def:
Yúyúqiū 於餘丘 (CHEN PAN 1969, 502-504)
Clan: Unknown.
Rank: Unknown.
Founded: Unknown.
Destroyed: Unknown.
Location: Very uncertain. According to the Dì míng kǎo lyè, Yúyúqiū was located in the modern Línyí 臨沂 district, Shandong province.
History: Yúyúqiū is mentioned only one time in the CQ (Zhuang 2; 692 B.C.). It is even not certain whether it was a state (as is suggested by the Du's commentary) or only a dependent town (as is suggested by the GONGYANG and GULIANG).

sense.def: Yúyúqiū 於餘丘 (CHEN PAN 1969, 502-504)Clan: Unknown.Rank: Unknown. Founded: Unknown.Destroyed: Unknown.Location: Very uncertain. According to the Dì míng kǎo lyè, Yúyúqiū was located in the modern Línyí 臨沂 district, Shandong province.History: Yúyúqiū is mentioned only one time in the CQ (Zhuang 2; 692 B.C.). It is even not certain whether it was a state (as is suggested by the Du's commentary) or only a dependent town (as is suggested by the GONGYANG and GULIANG).
